sys_ux_client_script.name: Update selected tab index

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_789d508f47cb02100ab7b4fe316d430e
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record default copy">509d504f47cb02100ab7b4fe316d4374</macroponent><name>Update selected tab index</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({ api, event, helpers, imports }) {
    const gFormData = api.data.gform.nowRecordFormBlob;
    if (gFormData.isNewRecord)
        return;

    const { selectedTabIndex, isInitialPageLoad } = event.payload;

    if (isInitialPageLoad === false) {  // Not emit CONTENT_UPDATED when isInitialPageLoad is undefined or true
        api.emit('CONTENT_UPDATED', {
            params: {
                selectedTabIndex: selectedTabIndex,
                query: api.context.props.query,
                views: api.context.props.views,
                extraParams: api.context.props.extraParams
            }
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-01 17:27:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>789d508f47cb02100ab7b4fe316d430e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update selected tab index</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_789d508f47cb02100ab7b4fe316d430e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-01 17:27:02</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
